title: how do i macro an ability to say something?
body:
i want to macro any "give me stats" ultimate (nasus/renekton/jax/shyvana/tryndamere*) to scream in all chat "I AM POWER INCARNATE" whenever i ult

how do i go about doing this

replies.body:
Assuming you have macros on your keyboard, you would have to press the macro key after programming it.  So for example, you press say your G1 key, which then would look like this in your recording:

R
Shift Enter
I AM POWER INCARNATE
Enter

Should make it say "TIME TO STAT-CHECK" instead.

Don't forget to make it do mastery emote at the same time.
